channel.title: How do u make a sever
channel.description: Can some one please tell me how to make a sever? I have bine trying for like 5 months and still i do not know how to do it. Can some on please help me? :o[br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2007, 11:51:17 AM[/size][hr]Can any one help me?

item.title: How do u make a sever
item.dc:creator: @Belthazar Belthazar
item.description:
@Belthazar wrote:

Ok for starters go to the download section of the forums and find an already made client.
Next what you need to do is make sure you have win rar.
Next you need to download the newest java format which is jdk 1.6
After this download the moparscape w/aryan on the dowload section.
Go to your clients folder and run the compiler.
Next run the server.
open up the moparscape.
For the server ip type in “localhost”
If you need help just ask.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make a sever
